member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILES
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves the list of supported profiles.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILES.NodeIndex
member.summary: For single GPU operation, set this to zero. If there are multiple GPU nodes, set a bit to identify the node (the device's physical adapter) to which the command queue applies. Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Only 1 bit may be set.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILES.ProfileCount
member.summary: The number of profiles to retrieve. This number must match the value returned from a call when the feature specified is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_PROFILES.pProfiles
member.summary: A list of GUIDs representing the supported profiles. The calling application must allocate storage for the profile list before calling CheckFeatureSupport.
